body_html: Do you have CC or CXX set by any chance? nvcc finds gcc or g++ as your default compiler and fails because of this. To build it you have to use a fairly od version of Apple Clang (7.3.1 - you can get it from the Apple Developer portal).
body_text: Do you have CC or CXX set by any chance? nvcc finds gcc or g++ as your default compiler and fails because of this. To build it you have to use a fairly od version of Apple Clang (7.3.1 - you can get it from the Apple Developer portal).
body: Do you have `CC` or `CXX` set by any chance? `nvcc` finds `gcc` or `g++` as your default compiler and fails because of this. To build it you have to use a fairly od version of Apple Clang (7.3.1 - you can get it from the Apple Developer portal).
